IntroText: (She doesn't bother to turn|around but seems to listen.)
(She turns to you and whispers) What?
(She doesn't turn around but whispers.)|Forget it.  You're not tying me up again.
(She turns to you and whispers)|Don't think about tying me up again.
(She turns to you and whispers) What?
(She turns to you and whispers)|Are you also bored out of your mind?
(She turns to you and whispers)|I wish there was a way to get out early.
(She turns to you and whispers)|What do you have in mind?
You want to kidnap her?  What's in there for me?|(You need 3 love or submission to convince her.)
(She doesn't bother to turn but whispers.)|I will help you but you do the first move.
(She points at your gag and grins.)
(She turns around and whispers.)|I'll get you out after class.
(She doesn't turn around but whispers.)|You fucking got what you deserved.
(She gives you an angry look|and chews on her gag.)
(She tugs on her cuffs,|trying to force them open.)
(She gives you an angry look|and chews on her gag.)
(She thrashes to reach a knot but fails.)
(She gives you an angry look|and chews on her gag.)
